content.question: In context, the reference to "The Great Reprieve" (Paragraph 5) emphasizes a time when

choices.label: humans recognized the destructive power they hold
the oceans underwent a number of climate-related changes
a marked contrast existed between the fates of fish and humans
a notable change took place in the food preferences of humans

content.answer: a marked contrast existed between the fates of fish and humans

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
